definitions.definition: A fake; an imitation that purports to be genuine.
definitions.example: The time-share deal was a sham.
A con-man must be skilled in the arts of sham and deceit.

definitions.definition: A false front, or removable ornamental covering.
A decorative cover for a pillow.
To obtrude by fraud or imposition.
To assume the manner and character of; to imitate; to ape; to feign.

definitions.example: It was only a sham wedding: they didn't care much for one another, but wanted their parents to stop hassling them.
